House of Commons. In an hour, the
Labour MP Frank Field has tabled an
urgent question to ask about the
services. Then MPs will return to
debate on last week's Budget, this
Chancellor announced a new hope to
purchasers to put down a 5% deposit
on a newly built home, much less
than some banks now demand. Up to
20 % of the cost of the loan will
be covered by a shared equity loan.
